wasm-limits.h

5#if !V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
6#error This header should only be included if WebAssembly is enabled.
7#endif // !V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
8
9#ifndef V8_WASM_WASM_LIMITS_H_
10#define V8_WASM_WASM_LIMITS_H_
11
12#include <cstddef>
13#include <cstdint>
14#include <limits>
15
16#include "src/base/macros.h"
17#include "src/wasm/wasm-constants.h"
18
19namespace v8::internal::wasm {
20
21// These constants limit the amount of *declared* memory. At runtime, memory can
22// only grow up to kV8MaxWasmMemory{32,64}Pages.
23constexpr size_t kSpecMaxMemory32Pages = 65'536; // 4GB
24// TODO(clemensb): Adapt once the spec defines a limit here. For now, use 16GB.
25constexpr size_t kSpecMaxMemory64Pages = 262'144; // 16GB
26
27// The following limits are imposed by V8 on WebAssembly modules.
28// The limits are agreed upon with other engines for consistency.
29constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmTypes = 1'000'000;
30constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctions = 1'000'000;
31constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmImports = 100'000;
32constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmExports = 100'000;
33constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmGlobals = 1'000'000;
34constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmTags = 1'000'000;
35constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmExceptionTypes = 1'000'000;
36constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmDataSegments = 100'000;
37// This indicates the maximum memory size our implementation supports.
38// Do not use this limit directly; use {max_mem{32,64}_pages()} instead to take
39// the spec'ed limit as well as command line flag into account.
40// Also, do not use this limit to validate declared memory, use
41// kSpecMaxMemory{32,64}Pages for that.
42constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmMemory32Pages = kSystemPointerSize == 4
43 ? 32'767 // = 2 GiB - 64Kib
44 : 65'536; // = 4 GiB
45constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmMemory64Pages = kSystemPointerSize == 4
46 ? 32'767 // = 2 GiB - 64Kib
47 : 262'144; // = 16 GiB
48constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmStringSize = 100'000;
49constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmModuleSize = 1024 * 1024 * 1024; // = 1 GiB
50constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctionSize = 7'654'321;
51constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctionLocals = 50'000;
52constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctionParams = 1'000;
53constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctionReturns = 1'000;
54constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmFunctionBrTableSize = 65'520;
55// Don't use this limit directly, but use the value of
56// v8_flags.wasm_max_table_size.
57constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmTableSize = 10'000'000;
58constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmTableInitEntries = 10'000'000;
59constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmTables = 100'000;
60constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmMemories = 100'000;
61
62// GC proposal.
63constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmStructFields = 10'000;
64constexpr uint32_t kV8MaxRttSubtypingDepth = 63;
65constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmArrayNewFixedLength = 10'000;
66
67// Stringref proposal. This limit is not standardized yet.
68constexpr size_t kV8MaxWasmStringLiterals = 1'000'000;
69
70static_assert(kV8MaxWasmTableSize <= 4294967295, // 2^32 - 1
71 "v8 should not exceed WebAssembly's non-web embedding limits");
72static_assert(kV8MaxWasmTableInitEntries <= kV8MaxWasmTableSize,
73 "JS-API should not exceed v8's limit");
74
75constexpr uint64_t kWasmMaxHeapOffset =
76 static_cast<uint64_t>(
77 std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max()) // maximum base value
78 + std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max(); // maximum index value
79
80// The following functions are defined in wasm-engine.cc.
81
82// Maximum number of pages we can allocate, for memory32 and memory64. This
83// might be lower than the number of pages that can be declared (e.g. as
84// maximum): kSpecMaxMemory{32,64}Pages.
85// Even for 64-bit memory, the number of pages is still a 32-bit number for now,
86// which allows for up to 128 TB memories (2**31 * 64k).
87static_assert(kV8MaxWasmMemory64Pages <= kMaxUInt32);
88V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uint32_t max_mem32_pages();
89V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uint32_t max_mem64_pages();
90
91inline uint64_t max_mem32_bytes() {
92 return uint64_t{max_mem32_pages()} * kWasmPageSize;
93}
94
95inline uint64_t max_mem64_bytes() {
96 return uint64_t{max_mem64_pages()} * kWasmPageSize;
97}
98
99V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uint32_t max_table_init_entries();
100V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE size_t max_module_size();
101
102} // namespace v8::internal::wasm
103
104#endif // V8_WASM_WASM_LIMITS_H_
